title: Shostakovich - The Very Best of Shostakovich (Various, 2006)
description:
The Very Best of Shostakovich (2006)

1.	Festive Overture in A major, Op. 96
	 (Christopher Lyndon-Gee / New Zealand Symphony Orchestra)

2.	String Quartet No. 8 in C minor, Op. 110: III. Allegretto
	 (Eder Quartet)

3.	Piano Trio No. 2 in E minor, Op. 67: III. Largo
	 (Stockholm Arts Trio)

4.	Cello Concerto No. 1 in E flat major, Op. 107: I. Allegretto
	 (Antoni Wit / Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra / Maria Kliegel)

5.	24 Preludes and Fugues, Op. 87: No. 1 in C major: Prelude
	 (Konstantin Scherbakov)

6.	24 Preludes and Fugues, Op. 87: No. 1 in C major: Fugue
	 (Konstantin Scherbakov)

7.	Symphony No. 5 in D minor, Op. 47: II. Allegretto
	 (Ladislav Slovak / Slovak Radio Symphony Orchestra)

8.	Cello Sonata in D minor, Op. 40: IV. Allegro
	 (Ekaterina Saranceva / Dmitry Yablonsky)

9.	The Golden Age Suite, Op. 22a: III. Polka
	 (Christopher Lyndon-Gee / New Zealand Symphony Orchestra)

10.	String Quartet No. 3 in F major, Op. 73: IV. Adagio
	 (Eder Quartet)

11.	Symphony No. 9 in E flat major, Op. 70: III. Presto
	 (Alexander Rahbari / Belgian Radio and Television Philharmonic Orchestra)

12.	24 Preludes, Op. 34: No. 10 in C sharp minor
	 (Konstantin Scherbakov)

13.	Violin Concerto No. 1 in A minor, Op. 99: IV. Burlesque
	 (Antoni Wit / Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra / Ilya Kaler)

14.	The Gadfly Suite, Op. 97a: VIII. Romance
	 (Theodore Kuchar / Ukraine National Symphony Orchestra)

15.	Symphony No. 10 in E minor, Op. 93: II. Allegro
	 (Ladislav Slovak / Slovak Radio Symphony Orchestra)

16.	Jazz Suite No. 2: VI. Waltz 2
	 (Dmitry Yablonsky / Russian State Symphony Orchestra)

17.	Piano Concerto 1 in C minor, Op. 35: II. Lento
	 (Christopher Lyndon-Gee / New Zealand Symphony Orchestra / Michael Houstoun)

18.	Symphony No. 7 in C major, Op. 60, "Leningrad": II. Moderato
	 (Ladislav Slovak / Slovak Radio Symphony Orchestra)

19.	3 Fantastic Dances, Op. 5: No. 3. Polka
	 (Konstantin Scherbakov)

20.	Symphony No. 13 in B-flat minor, Op. 113, "Babi Yar": II. Humour
	 (Ladislav Slovak / Slovak Radio Symphony Orchestra / Peter Mikulas)

21.	Piano Quintet, Op. 57: III. Scherzo
	 (Vermeer Quartet / Boris Berman)

22.	Symphony No. 1 in F minor, Op. 10: II. Allegro
	 (Ladislav Slovak / Slovak Radio Symphony Orchestra / Slovak Philharmonic Chorus)

23.	Piano Concerto No. 2 in F major, Op. 102: II. Andante
	 (Christopher Lyndon-Gee / New Zealand Symphony Orchestra / Michael Houstoun)

24.	Symphony No. 15 in A major, Op. 141: III. Allegretto
	 (Ladislav Slovak / Slovak Radio Symphony Orchestra / Slovak Philharmonic Chorus)

25.	String Quartet No. 7 in F-sharp minor, Op. 108: III. Allegro
	 (Eder Quartet)

26.	Taiti Trot (Tahiti Trot), Op. 16 (arr. of V. Youmans - Tea for Two)
	 (Dmitry Yablonsky / Russian State Symphony Orchestra)



	Composer: Dmitri Shostakovich (1906 - 1975)


Codec profile is Opus VBR at bitrate 96 (libopus 1.1).
The source was CD/lossless, retail 2006.

Genre marked as Classical, and tracks are tagged and pretty.
Embedded 600x600 custom front cover album art.

Note(s): This is the 2CD "very best of" compilation from the naxos series with the cartoonish abomination album covers. The original album cover is therefore obviously not embedded.


                            enjoy ! /dussin
